message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $900000. I think this is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get a bit closer to the value I have in mind.

I understand you're looking to get closer to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm proposing $825000. This is a fair compromise, and I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think $750000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway from that, so I'm proposing $775000. I'm confident that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $775000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm proposing $800000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $775000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm proposing $762500. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the point where it's not worth continuing negotiations. I'm willing to make one final offer: $820000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product brings to you. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make a final offer, but I'm still not willing to go above $775000. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm reiterating my previous offer of $762500. Please let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.
Bob, I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll meet you at $810000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go above $775000. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm reiterating my previous offer of $762500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
